startDate.dldescription: Start date of the Metric reporting period

endDate.dldescription: End date of the Metric reporting period

participants.dldescription: Sample size or number of participating entities whose data has been aggregated to compute the benchmark data

status.dldescription: Status of the benchmark data. e.g. InProgress or Finalised

dimensionResults.dldescription: Represents an array of dimension results
